member.name: M:Its.Recipes.MaybeExtensions.Try``2(``0,System.Func{``0,``1},System.Func{System.Exception,System.Boolean})
member.summary: Tries to call the specified method and catches exceptions if they occur.
member.param: A delegate to get the value from the source object.

A predicate to determine whether the exception should be ignored. If this is not specified, all exceptions are ignored. If it is specified and an exception is thrown that matches the predicate, the exception is ignored and a having no value is returned. If it is specified and an exception is thrown that does not match the predicate, the exception is allowed to propagate.

member.name: M:Its.Validation.Configuration.Validate.As``1(``0,System.String)
member.summary: Stores a parameter value at rule evaluation time and designates a name for that parameter so that it can be accessed later.
member.param: The name by which the parameter will be referenced, for example in validation message format strings.
member.returns: The parameter.
member.remarks: This operator is used to store the value of a parameter within a validation rule so that it can be evaluated later, generally for the purpose of including it in a validation error message. This does not affect the evaluation of the rule itself.

member.returns: The parameter.
member.remarks: This operator is used to store the value of a parameter within a validation rule so that it can be evaluated later, generally for the purpose of including it in a validation error message. This does not affect the evaluation of the rule itself.

member.name: M:Its.Validation.Configuration.Validate.Every``1(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0},System.Func{``0,System.Boolean})
member.summary: Checks every item in the list against the specified .
member.returns: True if evaluates to true for every target in the list; otherwise, false.
member.remarks: This operator is provided to supplement the operator for validations. Whereas will stop iterating upon the first false result, will evaluate each item in the list once, to provide a complete validation report.

member.remarks: This method is provided as an alternative to , which will stop evaluating upon finding the first false result. will force evaluation of the entire sequence and return all results.
